price: lo rechazaron y dijeron: "Fue aleccionado o es un loco".
arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَقَالُواْ مُعَلَّمٞ مَّجۡنُونٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma tawallaw ʿanhu waqālū muʿallamun majnūnun
